prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a shiny red shell and green accents.
Show me a tiny insect-like creature with large eyes and a segmented body.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage in forest environments with vibrant colors.
Design a small, rolling Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas and loves to explore.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique spiral pattern on its back and a playful demeanor.
I want a Venipede inspired creature that is friendly and loves to crawl on trees.
Make a Pokemon that has a tough exoskeleton and can curl into a ball when threatened.
